context: Test basic skill creation workflow for a code review skill

checklist.name: Clarifying Questions
checklist.description: Asks appropriate questions about skill purpose, target users, and success criteria

checklist.name: SKILL.md Structure
checklist.description: Generates SKILL.md with YAML frontmatter, overview, process, examples, and best practices sections

checklist.name: tile.json Format

checklist.name: Best Practices
checklist.description: Follows skill-builder best practices (clear names, concrete examples, agent-friendly)
